""" Run the parameter setup script
    """
x = np.pi * np.linspace(0, 1.0, 100)
y = np.sin(x)
pcoeff = utils.func_fit(x, y, 'polynomial', 3)
np.testing.assert_allclose(pcoeff, np.array([-0.0474660344, 1.30745471, -
    0.41617576, 3.08557167e-18]), atol=1e-09)
lcoeff = utils.func_fit(x, y, 'legendre', 3)
np.testing.assert_allclose(lcoeff, np.array([0.637115652, 6.83317251e-17, -
    0.684581686, -7.59352737e-17]), atol=1e-09)
bcoeff = utils.func_fit(x, y, 'bspline', 2)
np.testing.assert_allclose(bcoeff[0], [0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.31733259, 
    0.95199777, 1.58666296, 2.22132814, 3.14159265, 3.14159265, 3.14159265],
    atol=1e-05)
